title: Reincarnated into an Otome Game? Who Cares! I’m Too Busy Mastering Magic! - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adopted Children   Adopted Protagonist   Cooking   Doting Older Siblings   Elemental Magic   Fallen Nobility   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Magic   Mind Control   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Schemes And Conspiracies   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Sakurai Mitsumaru   櫻井三丸
description:
From the moment I realized, I was a silver-haired, five-year-old girl. I’m off to a great start…. not.

It seems that I have reincarnated into a fantasy world abounding in magic. At first I was quite shocked, but then I started thinking, could my soul be experiencing some sort of bonus stage after death? If this isn’t a dream, then I need to enjoy myself to the fullest!

Unfortunately, the world isn’t seeing it my way. My family life is oh-so-great with my new parents’ pending divorce and with a menace living in my house that is no joke. Why is it like this? If I don’t do something, how am I supposed to enjoy this wondrous world of witchcraft and wizardry?

And this is how Alice’s story begins.>
